Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Belmont
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Belmont due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Belmont due to a mechanical problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Westbound Reroute near North Riverside Mall
ShortDescription: WB 21 Cermak rrtd via Cermak, Harlem, 24th, mall Drive entrance-exit into Cermak, await recovery at Harlem & Cermak due to police activity nr No. Riverside Mall

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Harlem, 24th, mall Drive entrance-exit into Cermak, await recovery at Harlem, then resume normal route on Cermak due to police activity near North Riverside Mall.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute at McFetridge/Museum Campus
ShortDescription: 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Exp buses are rrtd via Lake Shore Dr, 18th, Solidary Drive & continue to Planetarium due to blockage nr McFetridge/Museum Campus.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lake Shore Drive, 18th, Solidary Drive and continue to Planetarium due to street blockage near McFetridge/Museum Campus.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
